name: taker-buy-sell-volume
description: Retrieves taker buy/sell volume data from Binance futures. Taker volume represents aggressive market orders that 'take' liquidity from the order book. Output includes: buy/sell volume ratio, absolute taker buy volume, and absolute taker sell volume. This metric helps identify market direction and momentum. A ratio > 1 indicates more aggressive buying pressure, while < 1 indicates selling pressure. Useful for confirming price trends and spotting potential reversals when divergences occur.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of data points to retrieve (max 500)

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.description: Start time in milliseconds since epoch

parameters.name: endTime
parameters.description: End time in milliseconds since epoch
